reviews.sentence: Almost there just need some jazzing up in hallways. Restaraunt food was excellent hotel is ok hallway to room was very drab and institutional in appearance.

Keep your reservation confirmation. There was a change in price for our room and we had no way of confirming because we deleted our confirmation email. we got in late traveling from costa rica and taking a flight in the morning home. It was Valentines evening. Most of the menu was not available when we arrived late. We ordered chicken wings and soup. The wings tasted off and old. the soup was disgusting. What a shame. When we stayed over on our way to our holiday the food and service was delicious and amazing. My husband and I became very ill and traveled back with unpleasant stomachs for 5 hour plane ride. Just tried to call and explain these to the hotel. Did not get anywhere. Their system was crashed when we wento book out. We said to email our bill. They never did. We wrote it down on a paper there and they had it in the reservation.

Close to the Airpot and expressway. This hotel is ideal for quick business stays. It is located minutes from the Airpot and had easy access to the expressway. The staff is great very hospitable. The rooms are comfortable clean and quiet. I have stayed here several times and do not recall ever being bothered by airport noise. The restaurant and bar have good food choices and both have a very relaxing atmosphere. Good hotel.
Comfortable room great restaurant.
Excellent. Comfy bed excellent room service meal close proximity to airport and shuttle. Bathroom sink was clogged.

Please overall. Nice hotel. Clean and friendly staff. Excellent location for anything near the airport. Room service was quick and the meal warm. I did not sleep well beds were a bit too firm for my personal preference. Other than that all good.

Great location prompt service good restaurant. I stayed at this hotel twice and both times were pleasantly surprised with the quality of their food and convenience of the location. Giving it 4 points because the rooms are well maintained but not very inviting in set up and decor. You kinda get “ sleep one night and go ” feeling at this hotel. Also if you book via Orbitz you will not get any points for your stay. Which is surprising but they said it ’s being like that for the last 3 years.

Great Hotel close to the Airport. Always enjoy staying at this Hotel close to the Airport very friendly staff who have been at this hotel for at least 25 years now. Makes you feel like you are home. From front desk staff to bar employees they are all wonderful.

Terrific Hotel with Exceptional Service. Every employee has a Positive Attitude and seems to want to go out of their way to please. High Quality Gym and 24 Hour Airport Shuttle Service makes this a great place to stay. World Class Ruths Chris Steakhouse is within walking distance and this Quality Hotel is used by Airlines to house their Professional Flight Crews. Highly Recommend.
Pleasant. Closeness to Pearson. Bar staff were pleasant. Atmosphere. it ’s all grey and ” industrial “ looking.

We arrived at the hotel June 19 no bell man no front greeting the hotel is under renovation. After waiting for a long line we finally got a room was connecting with other room we did n’t feel comfortable and request to change the 2nd room did n’t even clean yet we request change again the gentleman gave us he told us is upgrade room The room is ok but we found out the refrigerator still had last guest ’s meal inside there we did show the picture to the front but we are tired to change room againwe paid Cad20 for the room we later found out the room is only Cad121 onlythe next day we were taking airport shuttle to the airport the bellman did n’t tell us how and where to take the shuttle until we ask. Terribly. Service and managementl should ask a big concession.

The AC worked. They were originally going to charge me 25 dollars to park in an outside parking lot for 1 night. And breakfast was not included. Went to my room and the key did not work. Went back down to the desk and a different person got rid of the parking fee and included free breakfast.

When we checked in the lobby was blasting pop music almost to the point we could n’t hear the receptionist. Our room was dirty stains on pillow and a layer of dust in room. The door seemed like it was painted shut and made a terrible noise opening and closing which took a tremendous amount of effort. When we went to get the airport shuttle in the morning very early. the front lobby was still blasting pop club music. However it ’s a convenient location and they do have an airport shuttle service provided for free. If you just need a quick overnight it ’s probably okay. I would recommend getting delivery over the very overpriced restaurant though.

Do n’t bother. I am a Diamond Member and I will never stay at this property ever again. First. It is under constant renovation and no discount or apology give for that mess. Second. Do n’t every book through a third party travel agent because if you do then you are treated like a third class citizen. I wonder if Hotwire Expedia or Price line know that. The only exception there is the bar staff who are making do with a very poor temporary location. You all should be given a raise.
Excellent. The room. The food service is limited with one restaurant which has a very limited menu.

Under construction not a typical Hilton experience. This property is under construction. The lobby area is small and was super crowded since a massive party was checking in. The staff was nice. Since everything was blocked off for construction their Bar Resturant is located in a basement conference room and had a lackluster feel. I have always enjoyed staying at Hilton but this was a poor experience especially for the price they charged and I will stay somewhere else next time.

OK but could have been better. Staff helpful and friendly. Nice bed. Charging for wireless internet is a rip off and really annoyed me. The air conditioner kept making loud noises and waking me up. Hadnt been told on booking that the restaurant was being remodeled.

Disappointing. The hotel is undergoing modernisation shame they did nt say that before we booked. Lobby reduced in size noise from builders restaurant moved downstairs to a conference room. Breakfast food only warm and no hot plates the restaurant manager said she would reduce our food bill by 10 never did and we are still waiting for a copy of the invoice that reception said that they would send. Concierge position unmanned so difficult to store bags or get advice. Room though was fine but overall very disappointing and our first night in Canada.
Great sleep very quiet. The bed and pillows. Wait for food at restaurant.

On our December 2nd stay we appreciated the good bed and the courteous shuttle service. On the other hand breakfast was very expensive for the poor quality and variety Service was poor as well. Our poached eggs so strongly smelled of Vinegar and by the time they arrived our toasts were cold. Hilton should improve their breakfast buffet and include it with the room.
